segments.advisor_message: So, in terms of your dependent, it's important to list their full name along with their date of birth. This will help us assess the benefits you're eligible for.
segments.client_message: Yeah, but I mean, do I really need to list all that? It seems kinda unnecessary, right? I mean, I don't want to share every detail.

segments.advisor_message: I understand your concerns, but including your dependent's info ensures that we’re optimizing your benefits until they age out. When do you expect they might no longer be considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Well, if it's just for that, I guess I can share it. They were born on, uh, 15-06-2010. Probably won't be a dependent after they turn 18, so like, 15-06-2028.
